title: Chickpea Curry
steps: Dice onion, brown deeply in coconut oil
Chop sundries tomato’s, zest lemon, grate ginger. Smoosh garlic, add pepper flakes. Add all onions.
Deglaze pannwith chickpea water. Add chickpeas cook till golden
Add spinichnand wilt down
Add coconut milk, lemon juice, more grated ginger and simmer

title: Furikake
steps: Add ingredients to a spice grinder or something and grind em.

title: Onigiri
steps: Rinse and soak the rice 30min-4hr.
In a small bowl, mush salmon.
In another small bowl, mix tuna, mayo, and Chile paste.
In another small bowl, add soy sauce to finely shredded seaweed

title: Powerballs
steps: Mix thouroughly.
Roll into tablespoon sized balls.

title: Radichio Coleslaw
steps: Slice and mix Radichio and Cabbage, top with sliced walnuts.
Mix lemon juice and parmesan.
Smash garlic, add with mayonaise to sauce.
Add remaining ingredients to sauce to taste.

title: Walnut Pesto
steps: Add walnuts, Parmesan, lemon juice, olive oil and cloves of garlic to a food processor. Blend until smooth.
Add in basil, blend until smooth.
Add olive oil and Parmesan until texture is right, salt and pepper to taste.

title: Yuzu Soba
steps: Add bonito and wakame to boiling water. Simmer until broth is fragrant and tasty. This is Dashi!
Zest Yuzu into a little bowl. Add olive oil.
Juice Yuzu into a medium bowl. Add Dashi and a splash of soy sauce to taste.
Chop Bok Choy and Scallions.
Pour broth over cooked soba noodles, top with chopped vegetables and yuzu oil.
